name: singularity-legacy

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Singularity is a container platform focused on supporting 'Mobility of
Compute'. The software changed the installation method from AutoTools to
GoLang, so we have two separate package names to support that. The
legacy package is pre-version 3.0.0

dependencies.name: gnuconfig
dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.

dependencies.name: libarchive
dependencies.description:
libarchive: C library and command-line tools for reading and writing
tar, cpio, zip, ISO, and other archive formats.

dependencies.name: m4
dependencies.description: GNU M4 is an implementation of the traditional Unix macro processor.

dependencies.name: autoconf
dependencies.description: Autoconf -- system configuration part of autotools

dependencies.name: automake
dependencies.description: Automake -- make file builder part of autotools

dependencies.name: libtool
dependencies.description: libtool -- library building part of autotools.
